summary:
Custom Shader with ENB, four different settings using SHIFT + F12 and PAUSE BREAK.
My goal here was to bring more of that colder feeling to Skyrim while still having the option to change back to a color filled Skyrim, Also I wanted water and sky lighting to be more realistic.
Cold Look and Feel with a side of BLOOM. ENJOY ^^!
descriptionHtml:
*WARNING*
IF YOU ARE USING REALISTIC LIGHTING MODS TURN THEM OFF BEFORE STARTING GAME. THIS  MOD IS NOT FRIENDLY WITH REALISTIC LIGHTING MODS AND IS NOT CONFIGURED TO WORK WITH THEM.  


NOTE*
This is not my mod, it is my personal settings of ENB and Custom Shader.
Criticism is highly appreciated so leave comments or suggestions please.


INTRO:
This is my modified settings for ENB + Custom Shaders, my goal here was to bring more of that colder feeling to Skyrim while still having the option to change back to a color filled Skyrim, Also I wanted water and sky lighting to be more realistic, I couldnt do that without the Custom Shaders. So after a few hours (8 hours total not straight lol) of tinkering and jumping from desktop to game, I finally decided WOW this is the look I was going for. Everyone has different tastes, but I felt maybe there are people out there that have similar taste as me, so that pushed me to share the mod. Thank you Modding Community for inspiring me to tinker with Skyrim.


INSTALLATION*
Extract to \\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\(HERE)
Skyrim.ini and Skyrimprefs.ini, go....\\documents\\mygames\\skyrim\\(HERE)
If having trouble just message me.

If Installed properly, at default ENB Global and Custom Shader are both turned on and in use.


HOW TO USE*
TOGGLE ENB: (SHIFT)+(F12) In Game
TOGGLE CUSTOM SHADER: (PAUSE BREAK) In Game


SETTINGS*
1.) If you just want to Use the ENB Global setting press the PAUSE BREAK key to turn off custom shader (You can tell you did this correctly when textures become more colored and less sharpened)

2.) If you just want to use the Custom Shader, turn off ENB GLOBAL by pressing SHIFT + F12 keys together. Toggle on/off PAUSE BREAK key for Custom Shader.

With these options available you should be able to play four different settings, Vanilla, Vanilla Sharpened, ENB Global or ENB Global + Custom Shader.


IF YOU WANT TO SHARE SAME VISUAL EXPERIENCE AS ME USE THESE MODS:
1.)Skyrim_Sunglare_V1_2_HD_Lens_flare by Laast
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=116
2.)Sun_and_Clouds_Textures by canguilhem
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2616
3.)Dramatic_Clouds_Ultra by Anarin
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4910
4.)RWT_High_Res (High Resolution Water) by isoku
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=711
5.)Serious_HD_Retexture_Landscape_Skyrim by Z4G4
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2146
6.)Chris2012s_Whiterun_HQ_Texture_Pack_Full by Chris2012
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=114
7.)Re-Defined_Dungeons_WIP by Gizmo
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3147
8.)Real_Ice by Yuril
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5388
9.)Lush_Trees (If using Vurts Overhaul, Download the compatibility patch) by OpticShooter
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3385
10.)Vurts_Skyrim_Flora_Overhaul by vurt
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141
11.)Water_Sounds by John Kelly
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4226
12.)HD_Furniture_and_Barrels by quazaque
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=238
13.)Silly Level of Detail - Potions and Poisons by Narmix
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4259
14.)Enhanced_Night_Skyrim by CptJoker
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85#content
15.)High Quality Food and Ingredients by Iraito
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1192
16.)Enhanced Distant Terrain by OpticShooter
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1598
17.)Nicer Snow Flakes by evercharmer
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=296

NOTE*
NONE OF THE ABOVE ARE MY MODS, I DO NOT TAKE ANY OWNERSHIP OR ANY FORM OF CREDIT FOR THEM. DUE CREDIT TO THOSE THEY BELONG TO! THANK YOU ^^!


Credit goes to Confidence Man, HeliosDoubleSix, Tatsudoshi, Hunin, Boris Vorontsov, some_dude and anyone else who helped with the developement of the ENB and Custom Shader mods.
